entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 06:11 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:11 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 06:11 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
